abstract.text: A controller profile that tracks input from a mouse.

legalNotices.copyright: Copyright © 2025 Apple Inc. All rights reserved.

inlineContent.text: This profile supports a mouse with the following features:
An optional set of auxiliarly buttons
This profile provides only raw mouse movement delta values. For the cursor position at a specific time, use the

abstract.text: Reports the current mouse position in screen coordinates.
A continuous gesture recognizer that interprets pointer movement over a view.
Support hardware game controllers in your game.
